entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Wreckhouse
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:57 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wreckhouse 3:30 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: -4.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Wind Chill: -10
Wind: NNE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 10 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 17 February 2023
